程序包 com.music.player.lib.view

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    MusicSildingLayout.OnSildingFinishListener  
    MusicViewPager.OnAdapterChangeListener
    Callback interface for responding to adapter changes.
    MusicViewPager.OnClickViewListener  
    MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    Callback interface for responding to changing state of the selected page.
    MusicViewPager.PageTransformer
    A PageTransformer is invoked whenever a visible/attached page is scrolled.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CircleProgressBar
    hty_Yuye@Outlook.com 2019/5/25 一个支持圆形,饼形进度条的自定义View 如果是饼状:根据自身需求设置circlePrgBorder为0dp
    MusicBackgroungBlurView
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/10.
    MusicCommentTitleView
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2018/5/29 通用的标题栏
    MusicCommentTitleView.OnTitleClickListener  
    MusicCustomTextView
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2017/11/9 MusicCustomTextView
    MusicFanLayout
    hty_Yuye@Outlook.com 2019/5/25 一个碰撞的扇形
    MusicJukeBoxBackgroundLayout
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/6 PlayerJukeBox BG 要开启渐变，需指定backgroundEnable属性为true， 渐变特效只支持 >=23 API
    MusicJukeBoxCoverPager
    hty_Yuye@Outlook.com 2019/3/6 MusicJukeBoxCoverPager
    MusicJukeBoxView
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/6 BIG JukeBox 示例唱片机，负责UI的展示和播放、暂停系列通话，次组件不直接参与下一首、上一首的业务逻辑 内部并持有歌词显示控件 将此类事件一律抛出至持有此组件的活动
    MusicJukeBoxViewSmall
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/6 Mini JukeBox 迷你悬浮窗播放器，负责通过观察者更新UI
    MusicLrcView
    Created by TinyHung@outlook.com 2019/5/23 Music Lrc 默认歌词解析器为MusicDefaultLrcParser，如果需要实现自己的歌词解析 请继承MusicLrcRowParser复写其中两个重要方法
    MusicMarqueeTextView
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2017/11/27.
    MusicPagerAdapter
    Base class providing the adapter to populate pages inside of a ViewPager.
    MusicRoundImageView
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2018/9/1 自定义圆角View
    MusicSildingLayout
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/19 SildingLayou 锁频向右滑动手势Layout
    MusicViewPager
    Created by TinyHung@outlook.com 2019/5/24 这个类是基于系统的ViewPager做的修改，为了解决和歌词控件的手势冲突问题，简单修改了onTouchEvent方法 增加了单击事件回调，其他未做任何处理，用法和原生保持一致
    MusicViewPager.LayoutParams
    Layout parameters that should be supplied for views added to a ViewPager.
    MusicViewPager.SavedState
    This is the persistent state that is saved by ViewPager.
    MusicViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener
    Simple implementation of the MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener interface with stub implementations of each method.
    MusicViewPagerScroller
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/8 ViewPager Scroller
    MusicWindowMiniJukebox
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/12 Window MiniJukebox 迷你悬浮窗容器，只处理用户交互
    MusicWindowTrash
    TinyHung@Outlook.com 2019/3/18 Window Music Trash
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明

    胶盘状态
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    MusicViewPager.DecorView
    Annotation which allows marking of views to be decoration views when added to a view pager.
